inclusion.criterion: Patient received for the first time in Memory Consultation and not aware of his diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with a Mini-Mental State Assessment score (MMSE) ≥ 20
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient accompanied by a primary caregiver
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient able to provide consent to participate in research
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Man or woman 55 years and over
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Caregiver: The caregiver accompanies the patient and is considered as the main caregiver during the consultation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Caregiver: is able to provide consent to participate in research
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient: The patient is a 60 year old man
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient: complaining of frequent headaches, generalized bone pain and difficulty chewing that started 6 years ago and is worsening
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Examination shows bilateral swellings around the molars
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The swellings have increased since his last examination
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Several extraoral lesions are detected in the head and face
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient living in a care homes
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient protected by law (under legal protection, guardianship or trusteeship)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient with a hearing or visual impairment that does not allow to carry out assessments in Memory Consultation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and will be started on Bisphosphonate therapy.
